Name: The Eternal Battlefields
About the game: The Eternal Battlefields is a turn-based tactical game with emphasis on combat. Fight against randomly generated enemy armies, consisting of 11 different unit types. Loot items after each victory, level up your units and choose how to build them for battle, selecting from 150+ skills. The Eternal Battlefields is focused on battles and loot. Eliminate your enemies, loot them... Equip items and improve the units in your army. Level up your units and choose from over 150 skills to create the perfect build for your army. Eliminate enemies with radiation... ...hit them with meteors... and more. Engage in procedurally generated battles in which you never know what composition of units expects you the next step. Enemies could be equipped with powerful unique items as well... so defeat is always close. Try to reach the highest level of The Eternal Battlefields in the High Score mode or slowly grind away your way to victory after being defeated numerous times in the Roguelike mode.
